item.title: Will Robots Replace Designers
item.description: Algorithm-driven design tools can help us to construct a UI, prepare graphic assets and content, and personalize the user experience but can they replace us? While I was browsing trough the “2021 UI/UX Design Trends and How To Make Them Work For You” article by Kate Shokurova which I recommend you take a look at. At the end of chapter “#2 AI and other tools to the rescue” the authoress talks about the usage of AI in UX/UI.
